TopicTitle: EVA Portraits on Chairs and First Person View

Articles.Content:
Here's a fairly simple suggestion regarding the new EVA portraits for Kerbals. I love the addition, but just two more features along the same lines would go a long way.

1: Portraits in chairs. Kerbals sitting on external command seats should also have portraits.

2: First Person view. Equivalent to the IVA view on the internal portraits, we should be able to enter a first person view on vessels with external command seats. In addition, a first person view for EVA would be amazing and it's a feature a lot of people have been wanting for a long time. And the control scheme should be changed to be more like a first person control scheme, with W and S going forward and back; and A and D strafing to the side. Both movement direction and look direction is controlled with the mouse, but the mouse can be toggled with a right click, just as in the look-around on the IVA view.
